email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $49.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can bring the rate down to $50.00 per metric ton, but that’s as low as we can go. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 works for us. Can we finalize the laycan as 15-20 October and confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the booking. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John
